sub_title: Director Advisory Group Climate Resilience & Maritime - Netherlands
summary:
You are very welcome to consult me for your challenges related to water. My fields of expertise are water management, flood resilience, and coastal development. 

My Master of Science in “Integrated Water Resources Management” at Twente University in the Netherlands, provided a great start for an international career. In the following years of my career , I gained extensive international project experience in European, African and Asian countries (incl. resident positions in Nigeria, Indonesia, the Philippines and Singapore). 

My understanding of your challenges, business sense, engineering background, and drive allow me to make your projects a success. I have strong analytical and project management skills, providing a solid basis for good quality services.  My expertise covers the full scope of services; from masterplans, feasibily studies, conceptual and detailed design, assistance in tender processes to the execution of the works. 

In July 2016 I received my MBA diploma at the Manchester Business School. The MBA allowed me to further develop my managerial and business strategy skills, and taking up the responsibility as managing director in several roles for Royal HaskoningDHV in South East Asia. I am currently Chief Consultancy Officer for the Hydroinformatics Instituut (H2i) in Singapore. 

Feel free to contact me on wouter.de.hamer@rhdhv.com or wouter@h2i.sg
